metadata.title: CVE-2023-52641 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs/ntfs3: Add NULL ptr dereference checking at the end ofattr_allocate_frame()It is preferable to exit through the out: label becauseinternal debugging functions are located there.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
